Reel Making

A workshop where you can learn how to make fun and engaging video reels for social media!

About the Event

  • The event is a workshop where you can learn how to make fun and engaging video reels for social media.
  • You’ll get tips on storytelling and editing, and it’s a great chance to meet other creators and improve your skills together!

Rules & Regulations

  • It’s a group of 2.
  • 2 teams can form from a college.
  • The reel should be based on VISTARA and its theme.
  • Time limit is 30-45 seconds.
  • Reel should be submitted by 4 pm on 30/11/2024.
  • Submissions done after the given time will be rejected.
  • Both camera and phone are allowed; drones are strictly prohibited.
  • Editing is allowed.
  • Orientation must be in 9:16.

Judging Criteria

  • Best editing, colour grading.
  • Reel should satisfy the theme.
